column2: San Fernando Rey Mission in Los Angeles.
column3: Nice Grounds,Bob Hope memorial, Richie Valens memorial...very nice place to visit and the mission is 220 years old.

column2: Resting place if Richie Valens and the Rifleman among others
column3: Located in the San Fernando valleyliterally next door to the San Fernando Mission where one can find Bob Hope’s grave-is the final rest for such figures as Chuck Connors , the rifleman of 50’s t v ,Walter Brennan and Mr. LaBamba himself- Richie Valens.Look up location online before you go or you will never find it
